text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
There's a ramp before the finish line,<n>so before your next
race, you should<n>add some leg strength exercises to<n>your
training.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Mhm... good call!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: My, what excellent advice, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, Air Groove. Yes, all that studying<n>actually paid off.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But I'll never force myself into a box<n>again. I've learned my
lesson.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Everyone has up and downs in their<n>lives. Those
experiences are what<n>make you who you are today.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
True... I'm sure there will be many<n>more lessons to come,
and I'll take<n>them all to heart.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Then, someday, I'll pay you back for<n>our last race.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Heh. Don't you think for a second<n>that I'll make it easy for
you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wooow, you guys really sound like<n>rivals! I hope I can find
one or two<n>once I debut...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
They really do help us grow into<n>better racers... I'm sure
you'll meet<n>someone wonderful, as long as you<n>put in the
effort.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll start by winning my debut<n>race! Suzuka, tell me
more about<n>running strategies!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Someone's blasted to the front of the<n>pack! It's Special
Week! Special<n>Week's lead is growing by the<n>second!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ALL RIIIGHT! That's it! Make 'em eat<n>your dust!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Special Week finishes in first place!<n>She's won her debut
race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: OH YEAH! Way to go, Spe! Once weget back to campus, it's PARTYTIME!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oooooh! That was the best debut<n>everrr! Good for you,
Speeee!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The story of the greatest racer in<n>Japan has just begun.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The story of the greatest racer in<n>Japan has just begun.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It sure has.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew... That party wiped me out way<n>more than the race for
some reason.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
If Gold Ship finds out I slipped away,<n>there's no telling what
she'll make<n>me do...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if we'll have a party like this<n>once I win a race as
well.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Of course we will! I'll make tons of<n>extra buttery baked
potatoes! You're<n>the reason I won this race, so I gotta<n>pay
you back somehow!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh come on, I didn't do anything<n>special.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But you did! You taught me all sorts of<n>stuff about running,
helped me around<n>the school, and most of all...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
If I hadn't seen you run with a big<n>smile on your face, I
would never<n>have had the courage to chase my<n>dreams!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I could say the same thing to you.<n>After watching you chase
your<n>dreams so wholeheartedly, I wanted<n>to do the same.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Spe, your straightforward emotions<n>helped me take that vital
first step.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... Suzuka, I promise I'll<n>become the best racer in all
of Japan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
When I do, I hope I make you, my<n>mom in Hokkaido, and
Trainer very,<n>very proud!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
All right. As for me, I swear I'll never<n>stop chasing the
scenery I seekâ€”no<n>matter what.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It's a promise then! We'll both make<n>our dreams come
true.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes... I swear it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
By the way, Suzuka... Is it just me, or<n>did you call me Spe
before?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Um... Did I call you something<n>different?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You did! Don't you dare play dumb<n>with me! Do it again!
Call me Spe<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, oh, you...

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Who's the fav for today's race... Oh,<n>it's Silence Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
The girl who runs like a runaway<n>train? She hasn't done
anything<n>recently that would warrant being the<n>favorite...

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: True, but I do want to see herwin. Watching her run is seriouslyaddicting!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Feeling confident? I don't detect any<n>nervousness from
you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I feel ready to take on the world. All<n>thanks to you, my
teammates, and<n>especially Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You can do it, Suzuka! I'll be in the<n>front row cheering you
on!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right, and I'll be sure to answer<n>those cheers with a win.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your performance during training has<n>stabilized, so now all
you have to do is<n>run with all you've got.
choice_data_list: Take in that beautiful scenery from the front!
Take in that beautiful scenery from the front!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your performance during training has<n>stabilized, so now all
you have to do is<n>run with all you've got.
choice_data_list: Take in that beautiful scenery from the front!
Take in that beautiful scenery from the front!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay! Make sure you take in today's<n>view too!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Silence Suzuka takes her place in the<n>outer post of the gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The finish line lies 1,800 meters from<n>the gate. Just who will
get there first?<n>Aaand... they're off!
